front.title: Initializing a DNS Resolver with Priming Queries

abstract.t: This document describes the queries that a DNS resolver should emit to initialize its cache. The result is that the resolver gets both a current NS Resource Record Set (RRset) for the root zone and the necessary address information for reaching the root servers. This document, when published, obsoletes RFC 8109. See Section 1.1 for the list of changes from RFC 8109.
